# import/no-named-as-default-member <Badge type="info" text="Suspicious" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Reports use of an exported name as a property on the default export.

### Example

```javascript
// ./bar.js
export function bar() {
  return null;
}
export default () => {
  return 1;
};

// ./foo.js
import bar from "./bar";
const bar = foo.bar; // trying to access named export via default
```
